## Biography

Lee Ann Chapman is an Accounting Assistant in the Department of Statistics and
Data Science. Moving back to Pittsburgh from Florida, Lee Ann joined the
department in 2022 and works closely with the department Business Manager with
the daily financial function of the department as well as assisting the Program
Administrator with various departmental events throughout the year.
